Recommended Hardware

We have selected the optimal hardware configuration for Visper POS system.
Tablet, Smartphone or Laptop
Visper supports a wide range of devices and can be installed on older equipment. We recommend the Lenovo M10 tablet for its excellent price-quality ratio.
Termal printer
We tested numerous thermal printer models and recommend the Epson TM-T20II Ethernet and Star TSP-100 for their quality and reliability, as confirmed by our experts and customers.
Cash Drawer
Visper is compatible with any 24V cash drawer. The drawer connects to a receipt printer.
